column4: Is it necessary to install realplayer when I've got w32codecs and libxine-extracodecs? If yes: Is there a way to avoid installing realplayer and be able to play realplayer files?
mplayer with w32codecs plays most realplayer stuff
Is the realplayer within the w32codecs pack? or in the mplayer package?
the real 9 codecs come with w32codecs
